attributes.description:
Looking for a reliable come to southern Toyota.
Thanks for your interest in our selection of vehicles in stock at Southern Toyota in Lenasia. Complete the form below and one of our stock specialists will be in contact with you in due course, alternatively call us on 011 854 1340 or visit us at our dealerships situated at Cnr Nirvana Drive & Klipspruit Valley Rd (K43), Trade Route Mall, Lenasia, 1827 in Gauteng. We will assistance you personally with more information, arrange finance or arrange a test drive. Trade-ins are welcome. Terms and Conditions apply.
